#include<iostream>
#include<cmath>
using namespace std;
#define LL long long
#define I 1000000000
LL diff(LL a,LL b){return (a-b>0)?a-b:b-a;}
LL max(LL a,LL b){return (a<b)?a:b;}
int main()
{
 LL T,n,i,j,A[100000],x,ans;
 cin>>T;
 while(T--)
 {
  ans=I;x=0;
  cin>>n;
  for(i=0;i<n;i++)
   cin>>A[i];
  for(i=A[0];i<=A[n-1];i++)
  {
   for(j=0;j<n;j++)
   {
    x+=diff(A[j],i);
   }
   ans=max(x,ans);x=0;
  }
  cout<<ans<<endl;
 }
 return 0;
}
